feed.title: MakeNorth - House
feed.subtitle: Crafts, home automation, electrification, and emergency preparedness

entry.title: Home Solar, Part 2: Definitions and Terms
entry.summary: This blog post is the second in a series about installing solar panels on our house. In this post, we'll go over many of the definitions and terms that we came across, and try to define them in a way that's useful for someone that's not an electrician or solar installer.

entry.title: Home Solar, Part 1: Introduction
entry.summary: We've just finished a long-running project to install solar panels on our house. This is the first of a series of posts about the project, where we aim to cover everything from the initial planning to the final installation, along with posts on ongoing monitoring, troubleshooting, and lessons learned.
